mapper.select: select oid, m.mid as mid, mname, mphonenumber, did, price, datetime, ostatus, lname from orders o, members m, levels l where o.mid=m.mid and m.mlevel=l.mlevel and ostatus in (0,1)
select oid, m.mid, mname, mphonenumber, did, price, datetime, ostatus, lname, lat, lng from orders o, members m, levels l where o.mid = m.mid and m.mlevel = l.mlevel and oid= #{oid}
select oid, i.menuid as menuid, amount, menuname, menuprice, menuweight from itemmenus i, menus m where i.menuid = m.menuid and oid= #{oid}
